title._content: Image taken from page 74 of '[The Assault on Stony Point, by General Anthony Wayne, July 16, 1779. Prepared for the New York Historical Society, and read at its regular monthly meeting, April 1, 1862, with a map, fac-similes, and illustrative notes.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Assault on Stony Point, by General Anthony Wayne, July 16, 1779. Prepared for the New York Historical Society, and read at its regular monthly meeting, April 1, 1862, with a map, fac-similes, and illustrative notes.]" Author: Dawson, Henry B. (Henry Barton) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.f.20." Page: 74 Place of Publishing: Morrisania Date of Publishing: 1863 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000883007 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
